name: Not Af-RAID
description:
Not Af-RAID

In this game you play Alfraid in the day that changes his life forever, but not for the best, at all !

No one will ever now, but this family day becomes a nightmare and Alfraid got crazy and took all his family as hostages.

The police is here already and nothing can be done to stop them.

Only you can do is do everything to delay the inevitable end.

In this game, every action or objects are cards that you can use to be ready and delay the police.

The game lacks of explanation in game and some useful feedbacks, so we made a little video to explain you the game :
